Returns the body of the optimized wrapper method.

Specified by:
getWrapperBody in class FieldAccessTransformer
Parameters:
clazz - the class declaring field.
field - the field whose joinpoint wrapper body will be returned.
get - indicates if the wrapper is a field read wrapper or a field write wrapper.
index - the field index.

the optimized wrapper body.
